biography.bio: Franziska Walser was born on March 23, 1950 in Stuttgart, Germany. She is an actress, known for Fashion Victims (2007), Half a Life (2009) and Ohne einander (2007). She has been married to Edgar Selge since 1985. They have two children.
biography.name: Franziska Walser

biography.placeOfBirth: Bad Polzin, Pomerania, Germany [now Polczyn-Zdrój, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Robert Atzorn was born on February 2, 1945 in Bad Polzin, Pomerania, Germany. He is an actor, known for From the Life of the Marionettes (1980), Der Fall Jakob von Metzler (2012) and Tatort (1970). He has been married to Angelika Hartung since 1976. They have two children.
biography.name: Robert Atzorn

biography.bio: Imogen Kogge was born on February 8, 1957 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Requiem (2006), Phoenix (2014) and Barefoot (2005).
biography.name: Imogen Kogge

biography.bio: Sonja Baum was born on July 22, 1975 in Bonn, Germany. She is an actress, known for The Chambermaid (2014), Agnes (2016) and Der Tote in der Mauer (2008).
biography.name: Sonja Baum

biography.bio: Peter Lerchbaumer was born on March 2, 1945 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor, known for Tatort (1970), Der Mann auf der Brücke (2009) and Der Tod ist kein Beweis (2002).
biography.name: Peter Lerchbaumer

biography.bio: After he finished actors training at the Folkwang Hochschule in Essen, Wiggers was engaged at theaters in Duesseldorf, Bremen, Essen and Bochum, working with directors like Andrea Breth, F.P.Steckel, Wolf Redl, H.G.Heyme, Herbert Koenig, N.P. Rudolf and B.K. Tragelehn. Wiggers' roles include Lancelot in Der Drache; Ruprecht in Der zerbrochene Krug, Mercutio in Romeo und Julia, Juan in Yerma, Clov in Endspiel, Wurm in Kabale und Liebe, Orsino in Was ihr wollt, young Faust in Faust I, Melchtal in Wilhem Tell, the title role in Brand, Kandaules in Gyges und sein Ring, Theseus in Oedipus auf Kollonos, Laertes in Hamlet, Judas in Corpus Christi, Martin in Die Beichte, Jean-Michel in La Cage aux Folles, Thenardier in Les Miserables, Henry Higgins in My Fair Lady, and Bill in the Hamburg production of Mamma Mia! and on an international tour. He was Sam in the production of Mamma Mia! in Berlin. Together with Roman Polanski Wiggers developed the character of Chagal for the musical version of Dance of the Vampires. Wiggers also appeared in numerous TV and screen productions, e.g. Tatort, Polizeiruf 110, Die Kommissarin, Praxis Buelowbogen, Ein Fall fuer zwei, Im Namen des Gesetzes, Der letzte Zeuge, Balko, Der Clown, Eine unter tausend, Meine Tochter, Mein Leben, In aller Freundschaft, and Die Deutschen.
biography.name: Ulrich Wiggers

biography.bio: Kirsten Block was born on November 30, 1959 in Karl-Marx-Stadt, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress and writer, known for The Book Thief (2013), The Reader (2008) and Phoenix (2014).
biography.name: Kirsten Block

biography.bio: Lorenz Claussen was born on October 3, 1955 in Flensburg, Schleswig-Holstein, West Germany. He is an actor, known for The Hallo Spencer Show (1979), Paul Is Dead (2000) and Un amour de vache (1999).
biography.name: Lorenz Claussen

biography.bio: Birgit Koch was born in 1950. She is an actress, known for Mein Mann, der Trinker (2008), Gaspard et fil$ (1988) and L'enfant de l'amour (2003).
biography.name: Birgit Koch

biography.bio: Joachim Schoenfeld was born in 1963. He is an actor and director, known for Æon Flux (2005), Wanja (2015) and Berlin antigang (1993).
biography.name: Joachim Schoenfeld

biography.bio: Henry Meyer was born on February 9, 1963 in Dresden, Germany. He is an actor, known for Deux morts sur ordonnance (1998), Der Kreis Luther (2000) and Plan B: Scheiß auf Plan A (2016).
biography.name: Henry Meyer

biography.bio: Henning Bormann was born in 1972. He is an actor, known for Bridge of Spies (2015), In der Überzahl (2013) and Mein Mann, der Trinker (2008).
biography.name: Henning Bormann

biography.bio: Christine Prayon was born on May 22, 1974 in Bonn, Germany. She is an actress, known for Heute Show (2009), Rendez-nous notre fille (2005) and Mein Mann, der Trinker (2008).
biography.name: Christine Prayon

biography.bio: Jakob Höhne is an actor, known for Mein Mann, der Trinker (2008), Vom Ende der Liebe (2010) and Tatort (1970).
biography.name: Jakob Höhne

biography.bio: Holger Kugele is an actor, known for Mein Mann, der Trinker (2008), Tiere bis unters Dach (2010) and Tatort (1970).
biography.name: Holger Kugele
